title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles Results

organizations.name: monte carlo masters men's doubles results   17   results reuters

text: April 19, 2018 / 3:33 PM / Updated 3 hours ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Apr 19 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles matches on Thursday .. 2nd Round .. Raven Klaasen (RSA) and beat 6-Jean-Julien Rojer (AHO) (Walkover) Michael Venus (NZL) and Horia Tecau (ROU) 4-Bob Bryan (USA) and beat Romain Arneodo (MON) and 6-7(5) 6-0 Mike Bryan (USA) Hugo Nys (FRA) 1-0(9) Pablo Cuevas (URU) and beat 5-Pierre-Hugues Herbert 7-5 7-6(4) Marcel Granollers (ESP) (FRA) and Nicolas Mahut (FRA) Rohan Bopanna (IND) and beat 7-Jamie Murray (GBR) and 3-6 6-4 1-0(9) Edouard Roger-Vasselin Bruno Soares (BRA) (FRA)
